page.title: 09School Sports Day
page.content: On sports day we have races. We have four teams, red, green,yellow and blue; This year red team won. We have all kinds of races my best is the relay,we also have running races, egg and spoon,three legged, potato and sack races. The infants' classes have sports on a different day to juniors. We have proper lanes marked out on Frogmore. Parents come to watch, they sit one side of the track with the infants; all the juniors sit the other side in their teams. At the end, when the winning team is announced, there is a lot of cheering; the captains of the winning team, (Stephen Fletcher & Sarah Pitt), are presented with a shield. Nobody likes putting all the chairs away at the end.
